solution_line_template: A year is {months_per_year} months, so Elias spends {cost_per_bar} * {months_per_year} = $<<{cost_per_bar}*{months_per_year}={yearly_soap_cost}>>{yearly_soap_cost} per year on bars of soap.
In two years, he spends {years} * {yearly_soap_cost} = $<<{years}*{yearly_soap_cost}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} on bars of soap.
